_I was living, used to live, etc._ tÃº viv =Ã­as= _You_ (familiar singular) _were living, etc._ Ã©l, ella viv =Ã­a= _He, she was living, etc._ usted viv =Ã­a= _You_ (polite singular) _were living, etc._ nosotros (as) viv =Ã­amos= _We were living, etc._ vosotros (as) viv =Ã­ais= _You_ (familiar plural) _were living, etc._ ellos, ellas viv =Ã­an= _They were living._ ustedes viv =Ã­an= _You_ (polite plural) _were living, etc._ PRETÃ‰RITO yo viv =Ã­= _I lived, did live._ tÃº viv =iste= _You lived, etc._ Ã©l, ella viv =iÃ³= _He, she lived, etc._ usted viv =iÃ³= _You lived, etc._ nosotros (as) viv =imos= _We lived, etc._ vosotros (as) viv =isteis= _You lived, etc._ ellos, ellas viv =ieron= _They lived, etc._ ustedes viv =ieron= _You lived, etc._ FUTURO yo vivir =Ã©= _I shall live, be living._ tÃº vivir =Ã¡s= _You will live, etc._ Ã©l, ella vivir =Ã¡= _He, she will live, etc._ usted vivir =Ã¡= _You will live, etc._ nosotros (as) vivir =emos= _We shall live, etc._ vosotros (as) vivir =Ã©is= _You will live, etc._ ellos, ellas vivir =Ã¡n= _They will live, etc._ ustedes vivir =Ã¡n= _You will live, etc._ CONDICIONAL yo vivir =Ã­a= _I should or would live, be living._[374] tÃº habían comido
tÃº hablar =Ã¡s= _You will speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella hablar =Ã¡= _He, she will speak, etc._ usted hablar =Ã¡= _You will speak, etc._ nosotros (as) hablar =emos= _We shall speak, etc._ vosotros (as) INFINITIVO GERUNDIO =haber hablado=, _to have spoken_ =habiendo hablado=, _having spoken_ =Modo Indicativo= PERFECTO yo he hablado _I have spoken, have been speaking._ tÃº has hablado _You have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella ha hablado _He, she has spoken, etc._ usted ha hablado _You have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hemos hablado _We have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ©is hablado _You have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas han hablado _They have spoken, etc._ ustedes han hablado _You have spoken, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO yo habÃ­a hablado _I had spoken, had been speaking._ tÃº habÃ­as hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella habÃ­a hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted habÃ­a hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) habÃ­amos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) habÃ­ais hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas habÃ­an hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes habÃ­an hablado _You had spoken._ PRETÃ‰RITO PERFECTO yo hube hablado _I had spoken._ tÃº hubiste hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella hubo hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted hubo hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) hubimos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) hubisteis hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas hubieron hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes hubieron hablado _You had spoken._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo habrÃ© hablado _I shall have spoken, been speaking._ tÃº habrÃ¡s hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ¡ hablado _He, she will have spoken, etc._ usted habrÃ¡ hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) habremos hablado _We shall have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ©is hablado _You will have hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ =Modo Subjuntivo= PERFECTO yo haya hablado _I may have spoken, been speaking._[376] tÃº hayas hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella haya hablado _He, she 22 El dÃ­a siguiente, la gente que estaba de la otra parte de la mar, como viÃ³ que no habÃ­a allÃ­ otra navecilla sino una, y que JesÃºs no habÃ­a entrado con sus discÃ­pulos en ella, sino que sus discÃ­pulos se habÃ­an ido solos; 23 Y que otras navecillas habÃ­an arribado de Tiberias junto al lugar donde habÃ­an comido el pan despuÃ©s de haber el SeÃ±or dado gracias; 24 Como viÃ³ pues la gente que JesÃºs no estaba allÃ­, ni sus discÃ­pulos, entraron ellos en las navecillas, y vinieron Ã¡ Capernaum buscando Ã¡ JesÃºs.

may speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella habl =are= _He, she may speak, etc._ usted habl =are= _You may speak, etc._ nosotros (as) habl =Ã¡remos= _We may speak, etc._ vosotros (as) habl =areis= _You may speak, etc._ ellos, ellas habl =aren= _They may speak, etc._ ustedes habl =aren= _You may speak, etc._ =Modo Imperativo= habla (tÃº) _speak_ (_thou_) hablad (vosotros) _speak_ (_ye_) =TIEMPOS COMPUESTOS= INFINITIVO GERUNDIO =haber hablado=, _to have spoken_ =habiendo hablado=, _having spoken_ =Modo Indicativo= PERFECTO yo he hablado _I have spoken, have been speaking._ tÃº has hablado _You have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella ha hablado _He, she has spoken, etc._ usted ha hablado _You have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hemos hablado _We have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ©is hablado _You have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas han hablado _They have spoken, etc._ ustedes han hablado _You have spoken, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO yo habÃ­a hablado _I had spoken, had been speaking._ tÃº habÃ­as hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella habÃ­a hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted habÃ­a hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) habÃ­amos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) habÃ­ais hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas habÃ­an hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes habÃ­an hablado _You had spoken._ PRETÃ‰RITO PERFECTO yo hube hablado _I had spoken._ tÃº hubiste hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella hubo hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted hubo hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) hubimos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) hubisteis hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas hubieron hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes hubieron hablado _You had spoken._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo habrÃ© hablado _I shall have spoken, been speaking._ tÃº habrÃ¡s hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ¡ hablado _He, she will have spoken, etc._ usted habrÃ¡ hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) habremos hablado _We shall have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ©is hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ¡n hablado _They will have spoken, etc._ ustedes habrÃ¡n hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ CONDICIONAL PERFECTO yo habrÃ­a hablado _I should or would have spoken, been speaking._ tÃº habrÃ­as hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ el, ella habrÃ­a hablado _He, she would have spoken, etc._ usted habrÃ­a hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) habrÃ­amos hablado _We should or would have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ­ais hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ­an hablado _They would have spoken, etc._ ustedes habrÃ­an hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ =Modo Subjuntivo= PERFECTO yo haya hablado _I may have spoken, been speaking._[376] tÃº hayas hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella haya hablado _He, she may have spoken, etc._ usted haya hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hayamos hablado _We may have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) hayÃ¡is hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas hayan hablado _They may have spoken, etc._ ustedes hayan hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO, PRIMERA FORMA yo hubiese hablado _I might have spoken, been speaking._[374] tÃº hubieses hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella hubiese hablado _He, she might have spoken, etc._ usted hubiese hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hubiÃ©semos hablado _We might have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) hubieseis hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas hubiesen hablado _They might have spoken, etc._ ustedes hubiesen hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ (familiar singular) _were eating, etc._ Ã©l, ella com =Ã­a= _He, she was eating, etc._ usted com =Ã­a= _You_ (polite singular) _were eating, etc._ nosotros (as) com =Ã­amos= _We were eating, etc._ COMPUESTOS= INFINITIVO GERUNDIO =haber comido=, _to have eaten_ =habiendo comido=, _having eaten_ =Modo Indicativo= PERFECTO yo he comido _I have eaten, have been eating._ tÃº has comido _You have hubo comido
DespuÃ©s que hubo comido le dijo su madre: --Quiero pedirte un favor, si me lo concedes.
Su madre puso la mesa, y despuÃ©s que hubo comido, le dijo: 100 --Tengo que pedirte un favor.
Cuando llegÃ³ el Poniente, estaba muy enojado pero despuÃ©s que hubo comido, la madre sacÃ³ la niÃ±a y preguntÃ³ por el prÃ­ncipe Jalma.

eaten._ ustedes hubieron comido _You had eaten._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo habrÃ© comido _I shall have eaten, been eating._ tÃº habrÃ¡s comido _You will have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ¡ comido _He, she will have eaten, etc._ usted habrÃ¡ comido _You will have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) habremos comido _We shall have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ©is comido _You will have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ¡n comido _They will have eaten, etc._ ustedes habrÃ¡n comido _You will have eaten, etc._ CONDICIONAL PERFECTO yo habrÃ­a comido _I should or would have eaten, been eating._ tÃº habrÃ­as comido _You would have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ­a comido _He, she would have eaten, etc._ usted habrÃ­a comido _You would have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) habrÃ­amos comido _We should or would have eaten, hubimos comido

vivir =Ã­ais= _You would live, etc._ ellos, ellas vivir =Ã­an= _They would live, etc._ ustedes vivir =Ã­an= _You would live, etc._ =Modo Subjuntivo= PRESENTE yo viv =a= _I may live, be living._[382] tÃº viv =as= _You may live, etc._ Ã©l, ella viv =a= _He, she may live, etc._ usted viv =a= _You may live, etc._ nosotros (as) viv =amos= _We may live, etc._ vosotros (as) viv =Ã¡is= _You may live, hubisteis comido
tÃº hablar =Ã¡s= _You will speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella hablar =Ã¡= _He, she will speak, etc._ usted hablar =Ã¡= _You will speak, etc._ nosotros (as) hablar =emos= _We shall speak, etc._ vosotros (as) INFINITIVO GERUNDIO =haber hablado=, _to have spoken_ =habiendo hablado=, _having spoken_ =Modo Indicativo= PERFECTO yo he hablado _I have spoken, have been speaking._ tÃº has hablado _You have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella ha hablado _He, she has spoken, etc._ usted ha hablado _You have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hemos hablado _We have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ©is hablado _You have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas han hablado _They have spoken, etc._ ustedes han hablado _You have spoken, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO yo habÃ­a hablado _I had spoken, had been speaking._ tÃº habÃ­as hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella habÃ­a hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted habÃ­a hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) habÃ­amos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) habÃ­ais hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas habÃ­an hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes habÃ­an hablado _You had spoken._ PRETÃ‰RITO PERFECTO yo hube hablado _I had spoken._ tÃº hubiste hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella hubo hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted hubo hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) hubimos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) hubisteis hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas hubieron hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes hubieron hablado _You had spoken._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo habrÃ© hablado _I shall have spoken, been speaking._ tÃº habrÃ¡s hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ¡ hablado _He, she will have spoken, etc._ usted habrÃ¡ hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) habremos hablado _We shall have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ©is hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ¡n hablado _They will have spoken, etc._ ustedes habrÃ¡n hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ CONDICIONAL PERFECTO yo habrÃ­a hablado _I should or would have spoken, been speaking._ tÃº habrÃ­as hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ el, ella habrÃ­a hablado _He, she would have spoken, etc._ usted habrÃ­a hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ =Modo Subjuntivo= PERFECTO yo haya hablado _I may have spoken, been speaking._[376] tÃº hayas hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella haya hablado _He, she COMPUESTOS= INFINITIVO GERUNDIO =haber comido=, _to have eaten_ =habiendo comido=, _having eaten_ =Modo Indicativo= PERFECTO yo he comido _I have eaten, have been eating._ tÃº has comido _You have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella ha comido _He, she has eaten, etc._ usted ha comido _You have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) hemos comido _We have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ©is comido _You have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas han comido _They have eaten, etc._ ustedes han comido _You have eaten, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO yo habÃ­a comido _I had eaten, had been eating._ tÃº habÃ­as comido _You had eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella habÃ­a comido _He, she had eaten, etc._ usted habÃ­a comido _You had eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) habÃ­amos comido _We had eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ­ais comido _You had eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas habÃ­an comido _They had eaten, etc._ ustedes habÃ­an comido _You had eaten, etc._ PRETÃ‰RITO PERFECTO yo hube comido _I had eaten._ tÃº hubiste comido _You had eaten._ Ã©l, ella hubo comido _He, she had eaten._ usted hubo comido _You had eaten._ nosotros (as) hubimos comido _We had eaten._ vosotros (as) hubisteis comido _You had eaten._ ellos, ellas hubieron comido _They had eaten._ ustedes hubieron comido _You had eaten._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo habrÃ© comido _I shall have eaten, been eating._ tÃº habrÃ¡s comido _You will have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ¡ comido _He, she will have eaten, etc._ usted habrÃ¡ comido _You will have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) habremos comido _We shall have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ©is comido _You will have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ¡n comido _They will have eaten, etc._ ustedes habrÃ¡n comido _You will have eaten, etc._ CONDICIONAL PERFECTO yo habrÃ­a comido _I should or would have eaten, been eating._ tÃº habrÃ­as comido _You would have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ­a comido _He, she would have eaten, etc._ usted habrÃ­a comido _You would have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) habrÃ­amos comido _We should or would have eaten, comido _You may have eaten, etc._ =Tercera ConjugaciÃ³n= INFINITIVO GERUNDIO PARTICIPIO PASIVO =vivir=, _to live_ =viviendo=, _living_ =vivido=, _lived_ =TIEMPOS SIMPLES= =Modo Indicativo= PRESENTE yo habría comido
tÃº hablar =Ã¡s= _You will speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella hablar =Ã¡= _He, she will speak, etc._ usted hablar =Ã¡= _You will speak, etc._ nosotros (as) hablar =emos= _We shall speak, etc._ vosotros (as) hablar =Ã­as= _You would speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella hablar =Ã­a= _He, she would speak, etc._ usted hablar =Ã­a= _You would speak, etc._ nosotros (as) hablar =Ã­amos= _We should or would speak, etc._ INFINITIVO GERUNDIO =haber hablado=, _to have spoken_ =habiendo hablado=, _having spoken_ =Modo Indicativo= PERFECTO yo he hablado _I have spoken, have been speaking._ tÃº has hablado _You have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas han hablado _They have spoken, etc._ ustedes han hablado _You have spoken, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO yo habÃ­a hablado _I had spoken, had been speaking._ tÃº habÃ­as hablado =arais= _You might speak, etc._ ellos, ellas habl =aran= _They might speak, etc._ ustedes habl =aran= _You might speak, etc._ FUTURO yo habl =are= _I may speak, be speaking._[375] tÃº habl =ares= _You may speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella habl =are= _He, she may speak, etc._ usted habl =are= _You may speak, etc._ nosotros (as) habl =Ã¡remos= _We may speak, etc._ vosotros (as) habl =areis= _You may speak, etc._ ellos, ellas habl =aren= _They may speak, etc._ ustedes habl =aren= _You may speak, etc._ =Modo Imperativo= habla (tÃº) _speak_ (_thou_) hablad (vosotros) _speak_ (_ye_) =TIEMPOS COMPUESTOS= INFINITIVO GERUNDIO =haber hablado=, _to have spoken_ =habiendo hablado=, _having spoken_ =Modo Indicativo= PERFECTO yo he hablado _I have spoken, have been speaking._ tÃº has hablado _You have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella ha hablado _He, she has spoken, etc._ usted ha hablado _You have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hemos hablado _We have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ©is hablado _You have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas han hablado _They have spoken, etc._ ustedes han hablado _You have spoken, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO yo habÃ­a hablado _I had spoken, had been speaking._ tÃº habÃ­as hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella habÃ­a hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted habÃ­a hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) habÃ­amos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) habÃ­ais hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas habÃ­an hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes habÃ­an hablado _You had spoken._ PRETÃ‰RITO PERFECTO yo hube hablado _I had spoken._ tÃº hubiste hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella hubo hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted hubo hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) hubimos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) hubisteis hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas hubieron hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes hubieron hablado _You had spoken._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo habrÃ© hablado _I shall have spoken, been speaking._ tÃº habrÃ¡s hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ¡ hablado _He, she will have spoken, etc._ usted habrÃ¡ hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) habremos hablado _We shall have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ©is hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ¡n hablado _They will have spoken, etc._ ustedes habrÃ¡n hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ CONDICIONAL PERFECTO yo habrÃ­a hablado _I should or would have spoken, been speaking._ tÃº habrÃ­as hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ el, ella habrÃ­a hablado _He, she would have spoken, etc._ usted habrÃ­a hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) habrÃ­amos hablado _We should or would have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ­ais hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ­an hablado _They would have spoken, etc._ ustedes habrÃ­an hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ =Modo Subjuntivo= PERFECTO yo haya hablado _I may have spoken, been speaking._[376] tÃº hayas hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella haya hablado _He, she may have spoken, etc._ usted haya hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hayamos hablado _We may have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) hayÃ¡is hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas hayan hablado _They may have spoken, etc._ ustedes hayan hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO, PRIMERA FORMA yo hubiese hablado _I might have spoken, been speaking._[374] tÃº hubieses hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella hubiese hablado _He, she might have spoken, etc._ usted hubiese hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hubiÃ©semos hablado _We might have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) hubieseis hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas hubiesen hablado _They might have spoken, etc._ ustedes hubiesen hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) com =Ã­ais= _You_ (familiar plural) _were eating, etc._ ellos, ellas com =Ã­an= _They were eating, etc._ ustedes com =Ã­an= _You_ (polite plural) _were eating, etc._ PRETÃ‰RITO yo com INFINITIVO GERUNDIO PARTICIPIO PASIVO =comer=, _to eat_ =comiendo=, _eating_ =comido=, _eaten_ =TIEMPOS SIMPLES= =Modo Indicativo= PRESENTE yo com =o= _I eat, am eating, do eat._ tÃº com =es= _You_ (familiar singular) _eat, etc._ Ã©l, ella com =e= _He, she eats, etc._ usted com =e= _You_ (polite singular) _eat, etc._ nosotros (as) com =emos= _We eat, etc._ vosotros (as) com =Ã©is= _You_ (familiar plural) _eat, etc._ ellos, ellas com =en= _They eat, etc._ ustedes com =en= _You_ (polite plural) _eat, etc._ IMPERFECTO yo com =Ã­a= _I was eating, used to eat, ate._ tÃº com =Ã­as= _You_ (familiar singular) _were eating, etc._ Ã©l, ella com =Ã­a= _He, she was eating, etc._ usted com =Ã­a= _You_ (polite singular) _were eating, etc._ nosotros (as) com =Ã­amos= _We were eating, etc._ vosotros (as) com =Ã­ais= _You_ (familiar plural) _were eating, etc._ ellos, ellas com =Ã­an= _They were eating, etc._ ustedes com =Ã­an= _You_ (polite plural) _were eating, etc._ PRETÃ‰RITO yo com =Ã­= _I ate, did eat._ tÃº com =iste= _You ate, etc._ Ã©l, ella com =iÃ³= _He, she ate, etc._ usted com =iÃ³= _You ate, etc._ nosotros (as) com =imos= _We ate, etc._ vosotros (as) com =isteis= _You ate, etc._ ellos, ellas com =ieron= _They ate, etc._ ustedes com =ieron= _You ate, etc._ FUTURO yo comer =Ã©= _I shall eat, be eating._ tÃº comer =Ã¡s= _You will eat, etc._ Ã©l, ella comer =Ã¡= _He, she will eat, etc._ usted comer =Ã¡= _You will eat, etc._ nosotros (as) comer =emos= _We shall eat, etc._ vosotros (as) comer =Ã©is= _You will eat, etc._ ellos, ellas comer =Ã¡n= _They will eat, etc._ ustedes comer =Ã¡n= _You will eat, etc._ CONDICIONAL yo comer =Ã­a= _I should or would eat, be eating._ tÃº comer =Ã­as= _You would eat, etc._ Ã©l, ella comer =Ã­a= _He, she would eat, etc._ usted comer =Ã­a= _You would eat, etc._ nosotros (as) comer =Ã­amos= _We should or would eat, etc._ vosotros (as) comer =Ã­ais= _You would eat, etc._ ellos, ellas comer =Ã­an= _They would eat, etc._ ustedes comer =Ã­an= _You would eat, etc._ =Modo Subjuntivo= PRESENTE yo com =a= _I may eat, be eating._[378] tÃº com =as= _You may eat, etc._ Ã©l, ella, com =a= _He, she may eat, etc._ usted com =a= _You may eat, etc._ nosotros (as) com =amos= _We may eat, etc._ vosotros (as) com =Ã¡is= _You may eat, etc._ ellos, ellas com =an= _They may eat, etc._ ustedes com =an= _You may eat, etc._ IMPERFECTO, PRIMERA FORMA yo com =iese= _I might eat, be eating._[374] tÃº com =ieses= _You might eat, etc._ Ã©l, ella com =iese= _He, she might eat, etc._ usted com =iese= _You might eat, etc._ nosotros (as) com =iÃ©semos= _We might eat, etc._ vosotros (as) com =ieseis= _You might eat, etc._ ellos, ellas com =iesen= _They might eat, etc._ ustedes com =iesen= _You might eat, etc._ IMPERFECTO, SEGUNDA FORMA yo com =iera= _I might eat, be eating._[374] tÃº com =ieras= _You might eat, etc._ Ã©1, ella com =iera= _He, she might eat, etc._ usted com =iera= _You might eat, etc._ nosotros (as) com =iÃ©ramos= _We might eat, etc._ vosotros (as) com =ierais= _You might eat, etc._ ellos, ellas com =ieran= _They might eat, etc._ ustedes com =ieran= _You might eat, etc._ FUTURO yo com =iere= _I may eat, be eating._[379] tÃº com =ieres= _You may eat, etc._ Ã©l, ella com =iere= _He, she may eat, etc._ usted com =iere= _You may eat, etc._ nosotros (as) com =iÃ©remos= _We may eat, etc._ vosotros (as) com =iereis= _You may eat, etc._ ellos, ellas com =ieren= _They may eat, etc._ ustedes com =ieren= _You may eat, etc._ =Modo Imperativo= come (tÃº) _eat_ (_thou_) comed (vosotros) _eat_ (_ye_) =TIEMPOS COMPUESTOS= INFINITIVO GERUNDIO =haber comido=, _to have eaten_ =habiendo comido=, _having eaten_ =Modo Indicativo= PERFECTO yo he comido _I have eaten, have been eating._ tÃº has comido _You have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella ha comido _He, she has eaten, etc._ usted ha comido _You have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) hemos comido _We have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ©is comido _You have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas han comido _They have eaten, etc._ ustedes han comido _You have eaten, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO yo habÃ­a comido _I had eaten, had been eating._ tÃº habÃ­as comido _You had eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella habÃ­a comido _He, she had eaten, etc._ usted habÃ­a comido _You had eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) habÃ­amos comido _We had eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ­ais comido _You had eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas habÃ­an comido _They had eaten, etc._ ustedes habÃ­an comido _You had eaten, etc._ PRETÃ‰RITO PERFECTO yo hube comido _I had eaten._ tÃº hubiste comido _You had eaten._ Ã©l, ella hubo comido _He, she had eaten._ usted hubo comido _You had eaten._ nosotros (as) hubimos comido _We had eaten._ vosotros (as) hubisteis comido _You had eaten._ ellos, ellas hubieron comido _They had eaten._ ustedes hubieron comido _You had eaten._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo habrÃ© comido _I shall have eaten, been eating._ tÃº habrÃ¡s comido _You will have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ¡ comido _He, she will have eaten, etc._ usted habrÃ¡ comido _You will have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) habremos comido _We shall have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ©is comido _You will have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ¡n comido _They will have eaten, etc._ ustedes habrÃ¡n comido _You will have eaten, etc._ CONDICIONAL PERFECTO yo habrÃ­a comido _I should or would have eaten, been eating._ tÃº habrÃ­as comido _You would have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ­a comido _He, she would have eaten, etc._ usted habrÃ­a comido _You would have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) habrÃ­amos comido _We should or would have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ­ais comido _You would have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ­an comido _They would have eaten, etc._ ustedes habrÃ­an comido _You would have eaten, etc._ =Modo Subjuntivo= PERFECTO yo haya comido _I may have eaten, been eating._[380] tÃº hayas comido _You may have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella haya comido _He, she may have eaten, etc._ usted haya comido _You may have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) hayamos comido _We may have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) hayÃ¡is comido _You may have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas hayan comido _They may have eaten, etc._ ustedes hayan comido _You may have eaten, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO, PRIMERA FORMA yo hubiese comido _I might have eaten, been eating._[374] tÃº hubieses comido _You might have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella hubiese comido _He, she might have eaten, etc._ usted hubiese comido _You might have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) hubiÃ©semos comido _We might have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) hubieseis comido _You might have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas hubiesen comido _They might have eaten, etc._ ustedes hubiesen comido _You might have eaten, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO, SEGUNDA FORMA yo hubiera comido _I might have eaten, been eating._[374] tÃº hubieras comido _You might have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella hubiera comido _He, she might have eaten, etc._ usted hubiera comido _You might have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) hubiÃ©ramos comido _We might have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) hubierais comido _You might have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas hubieran comido _They might have eaten, etc._ ustedes hubieran comido _You might have eaten, etc._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo hubiere comido _I may have eaten, been eating._[381] tÃº hubieres comido _You may have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella hubiere comido _He, she may have eaten, etc._ usted hubiere comido _You may have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) hubiÃ©remos comido _We may have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) hubiereis comido _You may have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas hubieren comido _They may have eaten, etc._ ustedes hubieren comido _You may have eaten, etc._ =Tercera ConjugaciÃ³n= INFINITIVO GERUNDIO PARTICIPIO PASIVO =vivir=, _to live_ =viviendo=, _living_ =vivido=, _lived_ =TIEMPOS SIMPLES= =Modo Indicativo= PRESENTE yo habrían comido
tÃº hablar =Ã¡s= _You will speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella hablar =Ã¡= _He, she will speak, etc._ usted hablar =Ã¡= _You will speak, etc._ nosotros (as) hablar =emos= _We shall speak, etc._ vosotros (as) INFINITIVO GERUNDIO =haber hablado=, _to have spoken_ =habiendo hablado=, _having spoken_ =Modo Indicativo= PERFECTO yo he hablado _I have spoken, have been speaking._ tÃº has hablado _You have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella ha hablado _He, she has spoken, etc._ usted ha hablado _You have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hemos hablado _We have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ©is hablado _You have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas han hablado _They have spoken, etc._ ustedes han hablado _You have spoken, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO yo habÃ­a hablado _I had spoken, had been speaking._ tÃº habÃ­as hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella habÃ­a hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted habÃ­a hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) habÃ­amos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) habÃ­ais hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas habÃ­an hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes habÃ­an hablado _You had spoken._ PRETÃ‰RITO PERFECTO yo hube hablado _I had spoken._ tÃº hubiste hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella hubo hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted hubo hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) hubimos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) hubisteis hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas hubieron hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes hubieron hablado _You had spoken._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo habrÃ© hablado _I shall have spoken, been speaking._ tÃº habrÃ¡s hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ¡ hablado _He, she will have spoken, etc._ usted habrÃ¡ hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) habremos hablado _We shall have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ©is hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ¡n hablado _They will have spoken, etc._ ustedes habrÃ¡n hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ CONDICIONAL PERFECTO yo habrÃ­a hablado _I should or would have spoken, hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ =Modo Subjuntivo= PERFECTO yo haya hablado _I may have spoken, been speaking._[376] tÃº hayas hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella haya hablado _He, she will have eaten, etc._ usted habrÃ¡ comido _You will have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) habremos comido _We shall have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ©is comido _You will have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ¡n comido _They will have eaten, etc._ ustedes habrÃ¡n comido _You will have eaten, etc._ CONDICIONAL PERFECTO yo habrÃ­a comido _I should or would have eaten, been eating._ tÃº habrÃ­as comido _You would have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ­a comido _He, she would have eaten, etc._ usted habrÃ­a comido _You would have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) habrÃ­amos comido _We should or would have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ­ais comido _You would have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ­an comido _They would have eaten, etc._ ustedes habrÃ­an comido _You would have eaten, etc._ =Modo Subjuntivo= PERFECTO yo haya comido _I may have eaten, been eating._[380] tÃº hayas comido _You may have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella haya comido _He, she may have eaten, etc._ usted haya comido _You may have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) hayamos comido _We may have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) hayÃ¡is comido _You may have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas hayan comido _They may have eaten, etc._ ustedes hayan comido _You may have eaten, etc._ usted hubiese comido _You might have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) hubiÃ©semos comido _We might have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) hubieseis comido _You might have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas hubiesen comido _They might have eaten, etc._ ustedes hubiesen comido _You might have eaten, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO, SEGUNDA FORMA yo hubiera comido _I might have eaten, been eating._[374] tÃº hubieras comido _You might have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella hubiera comido _He, she might have eaten, etc._ usted hubiera comido _You might have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) hubiÃ©ramos comido _We might have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) hubierais comido _You might have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas hubieran comido _They might have eaten, etc._ ustedes hubieran comido _You might have eaten, etc._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo hubiere comido _I may have eaten, been eating._[381] tÃº hubieres comido _You may have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella hubiere comido _He, she may have eaten, etc._ usted hubiere comido _You may have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) hubiÃ©remos comido _We may have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) hubiereis comido _You may have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas hubieren comido _They may have eaten, etc._ ustedes hubieren comido _You may have eaten, etc._ =Tercera ConjugaciÃ³n= INFINITIVO GERUNDIO PARTICIPIO PASIVO =vivir=, _to live_ =viviendo=, _living_ =vivido=, _lived_ =TIEMPOS SIMPLES= =Modo Indicativo= PRESENTE yo viv =o= _I live, am living, do live._ tÃº viv =es= _You_ (familiar singular) _live, etc._ Ã©l, ella viv =e= _He, she lives, etc._ usted viv =e= _You_ (polite singular) _live, etc._ nosotros (as) viv =imos= _We live, etc._ vosotros (as) viv =Ã­s= _You_ (familiar plural) _live, etc._ ellos, ellas viv =en= _They live, etc._ ustedes viv =en= _You_ (polite plural) _live, etc._ IMPERFECTO yo viv =Ã­a= _I was living, used to live, etc._ tÃº viv =Ã­as= _You_ (familiar singular) _were living, etc._ Ã©l, ella viv =Ã­a= _He, she was living, etc._ usted viv =Ã­a= _You_ (polite singular) _were living, etc._ nosotros (as) viv =Ã­amos= _We were living, etc._ vosotros (as) viv =Ã­ais= _You_ (familiar plural) _were living, etc._ ellos, ellas viv =Ã­an= _They were living._ ustedes viv =Ã­an= _You_ (polite plural) _were living, etc._ PRETÃ‰RITO yo viv =Ã­= _I lived, did live._ tÃº viv =iste= _You lived, etc._ Ã©l, ella viv =iÃ³= _He, she lived, etc._ usted viv =iÃ³= _You lived, etc._ nosotros (as) viv =imos= _We lived, etc._ vosotros (as) viv =isteis= _You lived, etc._ ellos, ellas viv =ieron= _They lived, etc._ ustedes viv =ieron= _You lived, etc._ FUTURO yo vivir =Ã©= _I shall live, be living._ tÃº vivir =Ã¡s= _You will live, etc._ Ã©l, ella vivir =Ã¡= _He, she will live, etc._ usted vivir =Ã¡= _You will live, etc._ nosotros (as) vivir =emos= _We shall live, etc._ vosotros (as) vivir =Ã©is= _You will live, etc._ ellos, ellas vivir =Ã¡n= _They will live, etc._ ustedes vivir =Ã¡n= _You will live, etc._ CONDICIONAL yo vivir =Ã­a= _I should or would live, be living._[374] tÃº vivir =Ã­as= _You would live, etc._ Ã©l, ella vivir =Ã­a= _He, she would live, etc._ usted vivir =Ã­a= _You would live, etc._ nosotros (as) vivir =Ã­amos= _We should or would live, etc._ vosotros (as) vivir =Ã­ais= _You would live, etc._ ellos, ellas vivir =Ã­an= _They would live, etc._ ustedes vivir =Ã­an= _You would live, etc._ =Modo Subjuntivo= PRESENTE yo viv =a= _I may live, be living._[382] tÃº viv =as= _You may live, etc._ Ã©l, ella viv =a= _He, she may live, etc._ usted viv =a= _You may live, etc._ nosotros (as) viv =amos= _We may live, etc._ vosotros (as) viv =Ã¡is= _You may live, etc._ ellos, ellas viv =an= _They may live, etc._ ustedes viv =an= _You may live, etc._ IMPERFECTO, PRIMERA FORMA yo viv =iese= _I might live, be living_.[374] tÃº viv =ieses= _You might live, etc_.

coma
It may occur between the article and its substantive, the possessive adjective and its substantive, a preposition and its object, the negatives _no_ and _ni_ and a following vowel; and after the conjunctions _y, que, si_, and other words having a weak accent such as _desde, coma, todo, otro, cuando_, etc.
RELATED WORDS: =MecanÃ³grafo=, _typewriter_ (_the person_); =taquÃ­grafo=, _stenographer_; =mÃ¡quina con caracteres en espaÃ±ol=, _typewriter with Spanish keyboard_; =mÃ¡quina de escribir de escritura visible=, _typewriter with visible writing_; =teclado=, _keyboard_; =tecla para mayÃºsculas=, _(shift) key for capitals_; =tecla para minÃºsculas=, _key for small letters_; =cifras=, _numerals_; =signos=, _signs_; =palanca= (_lever_) =de retroceso=, _back spacer_; =palanca de espacios=, _spacer_; =espacios sencillos=, _single spacing_; =espacios dobles=; =espacios triples=; =papel de mÃ¡quina=; =papel carbÃ³n= or =de calcar=; =papel de estarcir=, _stencil paper_; =cinta=, _ribbon_; =cinta de un color=; =cinta de dos colores=; =color negro=, =rojo=, =pÃºrpura=; =coma=; =dos puntos=, _colon_; =punto y coma=; =punto=; =puntos suspensivos=; =acento=; =acento agudo=; =acento grave=; =acento circunflejo=; =parÃ©ntesis=; =abrir el parÃ©ntesis=; =cerrar el parÃ©ntesis=; =signo de interrogaciÃ³n=; =signo de admiraciÃ³n=; =guiÃ³n=, _hyphen_; =subrayado=, _underlined_; =apÃ³strofo=; =raya oblicua=, _slant bar_; =signo de etcÃ©tera=; =signo de tanto por ciento=; =signo de pesos=.
=coma=, _f._, comma.
--MaÃ±ana (dijo) cortarÃ© estas cuarenta, y las llevarÃ© al mercado de CÃ¡diz.--Â¡Feliz quien se las coma!
[60.22] =Â¡Feliz quien se las coma!= 'happy he who eats them.' The pronoun =se=, an ethical dative or dative of interest, is best not translated.
=punto=, _m._, point, place, period; =al ----=, at once; =dos ----s=, colon; =---- de escala=, stopping point; =---- de honor=, question of honor; =---- de vista=, viewpoint; =---- y coma=, semicolon.
} =Gracias.= =Muchas gracias.= =Mil gracias.= _Thank you._ =De nada.= =No hay de que.= _Don't mention it._ =DispÃ©nseme usted.= =Con permiso suyo.= _Excuse me._ =La lecciÃ³n de lectura= =PÃ³ngase usted de pie.= _Rise._ =Â¿CuÃ¡l es la lecciÃ³n para hoy?= _What is the lesson for to-day?_ =Abra usted el libro.= _Open your book._ =Lea usted.= _You may read._ =Â¿Lo entiende usted?= _Do you understand it?_ =Traduzca usted al inglÃ©s.= _Translate into English._ =DÃ­game usted en espaÃ±ol lo que acaba de leer.= _Tell me in Spanish what you have just read._ =Siga usted leyendo.= _Continue reading._ =Repita usted cuando le corrijo.= _Repeat when I correct you._ =Usted pronuncia muy bien.= _You pronounce very well._ =No lea usted tan de prisa.= _Do not read so fast._ =En el pizarrÃ³n= =Vaya usted al pizarrÃ³n.= _Go to the blackboard._ =Tome usted el borrador.= _Take the eraser._ =Borre usted la escritura.= _Erase the writing._ =Tome usted la tiza.= _Pick up the chalk._ =Escriba usted la oraciÃ³n.= _Write the sentence._ =Â¿QuiÃ©n puede corregir las faltas?= _Who can correct the mistakes?_ =Â¿Es correcta la oraciÃ³n?= _Is the sentence correct?_ =La escritura es muy mala.= _The handwriting is very bad._ =Â¿QuiÃ©n quiere hacer una pregunta?= _Who wishes to ask a question?_ =EstÃ¡ bien.= =SiÃ©ntese usted.= _All right._ _Be seated._ =Dictado y PuntuaciÃ³n= =Presten ustedes atenciÃ³n.= _Pay attention._ =Primero voy a leer el pÃ¡rrafo entero.= _I am going to read first the whole paragraph._ =DespuÃ©s de haber oÃ­do cada frase, escrÃ­banla ustedes.= _After each phrase is read, write it down._ =Lean y corrijan ustedes cuidadosamente todo el pÃ¡rrafo.= _Read and correct with care the whole paragraph._ =Punto final, coma, punto y coma, dos puntos.= _Period, comma, semicolon, colon._ =Signos de admiraciÃ³n(Â¡!), signos de interrogaciÃ³n (Â¿?).= _Exclamation point, question mark._ =Principio de admiraciÃ³n (Â¡),= _first exclamation point_, =de interrogaciÃ³n= (=Â¿=), _first question mark;_ =fin de admiraciÃ³n= (=!=), _last exclamation point,_ =de interrogaciÃ³n (?),= _last question mark._ =GuiÃ³n= (de divisiÃ³n).

coma
It may occur between the article and its substantive, the possessive adjective and its substantive, a preposition and its object, the negatives _no_ and _ni_ and a following vowel; and after the conjunctions _y, que, si_, and other words having a weak accent such as _desde, coma, todo, otro, cuando_, etc.

coman
--Â¡Mal rayo me parta treinta veces y media, y permita Dios que al primer noroeste que me coja en la mar me coman las merluzas!...

comiere
50 Este es el pan que desciende del cielo, para que el que de Ã©l comiere, no muera.
23 Mas el que hace diferencia, si comiere, es condenado, porque no [comiÃ³] por fe: y todo lo que no es de fe, es pecado.
51 Yo soy el pan vivo que he descendido del cielo: si alguno comiere de este pan, vivirÃ¡ para siempre; y el pan que yo darÃ© es mi carne, la cual yo darÃ© por la vida del mundo.

(familiar singular) _eat, etc._ Ã©l, ella com =e= _He, she eats, etc._ usted com =e= _You_ (polite singular) _eat, etc._ nosotros (as) com =emos= _We eat, etc._ vosotros (as) com =Ã©is= _You_ (familiar plural) _eat, etc._ ellos, ellas com =en= _They eat, etc._ ustedes com =en= _You_ (polite plural) _eat, etc._ IMPERFECTO yo com =Ã­a= _I was eating, used to eat, ate._ tÃº com =Ã­as= _You_ (familiar singular) _were eating, etc._ Ã©l, ella com =Ã­a= _He, she was eating, etc._ usted com =Ã­a= _You_ (polite singular) _were eating, etc._ nosotros (as) com =Ã­amos= _We were eating, etc._ vosotros (as) com =Ã­ais= _You_ (familiar plural) _were eating, etc._ ellos, ellas com =Ã­an= _They were eating, etc._ ustedes com =Ã­an= _You_ (polite plural) _were eating, etc._ PRETÃ‰RITO yo com =Ã­= _I ate, did eat._ tÃº com =iste= _You ate, etc._ Ã©l, ella com =iÃ³= _He, she ate, etc._ usted com =iÃ³= _You ate, etc._ nosotros (as) com =imos= _We ate, etc._ vosotros (as) com =isteis= _You ate, etc._ ellos, ellas com =ieron= _They ate, etc._ ustedes com =ieron= _You ate, etc._ FUTURO yo comer =Ã©= _I shall eat, be eating._ tÃº comer =Ã¡s= _You will eat, etc._ Ã©l, ella comer =Ã¡= _He, she will eat, etc._ usted comer =Ã¡= _You will eat, etc._ nosotros (as) comer =emos= _We shall eat, etc._ vosotros (as) comer =Ã©is= _You will eat, etc._ ellos, ellas comer =Ã¡n= _They will eat, etc._ ustedes comer =Ã¡n= _You will eat, etc._ CONDICIONAL yo comer =Ã­a= _I should or would eat, be eating._ tÃº comer =Ã­as= _You would eat, etc._ Ã©l, ella comer =Ã­a= _He, she would eat, etc._ usted comer =Ã­a= _You would eat, etc._ nosotros (as) comer =Ã­amos= _We should or would eat, etc._ vosotros (as) comer =Ã­ais= _You would eat, etc._ ellos, ellas comer =Ã­an= _They would eat, etc._ ustedes COMPUESTOS= INFINITIVO GERUNDIO =haber comido=, _to have eaten_ =habiendo comido=, _having eaten_ =Modo Indicativo= PERFECTO yo he comido _I have eaten, have been eating._ tÃº has comido _You have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella ha comido _He, she has eaten, etc._ usted ha comido _You have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) hemos comido _We have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ©is comido _You have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas han comido _They have eaten, etc._ ustedes han comido _You have eaten, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO yo habÃ­a comido _I had eaten, had been eating._ tÃº habÃ­as comido _You had eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella habÃ­a comido _He, she had eaten, etc._ usted habÃ­a comido _You had eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) habÃ­amos comido _We had eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ­ais comido _You had eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas habÃ­an comido _They had eaten, etc._ ustedes habÃ­an comido _You had eaten, etc._ PRETÃ‰RITO PERFECTO yo hube comido _I had eaten._ tÃº hubiste comido _You had eaten._ Ã©l, ella hubo comido _He, she had eaten._ usted hubo comido _You had eaten._ nosotros (as) hubimos comido _We had eaten._ vosotros (as) hubisteis comido _You had eaten._ ellos, ellas hubieron comido _They had eaten._ ustedes hubieron comido _You had eaten._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo habrÃ© comido _I shall have eaten, been eating._ tÃº habrÃ¡s comido _You will have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ¡ comido _He, she will have eaten, etc._ usted habrÃ¡ comido _You will have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) habremos comido _We shall have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ©is comido _You will have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ¡n comido _They will have eaten, etc._ ustedes habrÃ¡n comido _You will have eaten, etc._ CONDICIONAL PERFECTO yo habrÃ­a comido _I should or would have eaten, been eating._ tÃº habrÃ­as comido _You would have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ­a comido _He, she would have eaten, etc._ usted habrÃ­a comido _You would have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) habrÃ­amos comido _We should or would have eaten, hayas comido

haya comido

etc._ ellos, ellas viv =an= _They may live, etc._ ustedes viv =an= _You may live, etc._ IMPERFECTO, PRIMERA FORMA yo viv =iese= _I might live, be living_.[374] tÃº viv =ieses= _You might live, etc_.

hayamos comido
tÃº hablar =Ã¡s= _You will speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella hablar =Ã¡= _He, she will speak, etc._ usted hablar =Ã¡= _You will speak, etc._ nosotros (as) hablar =emos= _We shall speak, etc._ vosotros (as) hablar =Ã©is= _You will speak, etc._ ellos, ellas hablar =Ã¡n= _They will speak, etc._ ustedes hablar =Ã¡n= _You will speak._ CONDICIONAL yo hablar =Ã­a= _I should or would speak, be speaking._ tÃº hablar =Ã­as= _You would speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella hablar =Ã­a= _He, she would speak, etc._ usted hablar =Ã­a= _You would speak, etc._ nosotros (as) hablar =Ã­amos= _We should or would speak, etc._ vosotros (as) hablar =Ã­ais= _You would speak, etc._ ellos, ellas hablar =Ã­an= _They would speak, etc._ ustedes hablar =Ã­an= _You would speak, etc._ =Modo Subjuntivo= PRESENTE yo habl =e= _I may speak, be speaking._[374] tÃº habl =es= _You may speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella habl =e= _He, she may speak, etc._ usted habl =e= _You may speak, etc._ nosotros (as) habl =emos= _We may speak, etc._ vosotros (as) habl =Ã©is= _You may speak, etc._ ellos, ellas habl =en= _They may speak, etc._ ustedes habl =en= _You may speak, etc._ IMPERFECTO, PRIMERA FORMA yo habl =ase= _I might speak, be speaking._[374] tÃº habl =ases= _You might speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella habl =ase= _He, she might speak, etc._ usted habl =ase= _You might speak, etc._ nosotros (as) habl =Ã¡semos= _We might speak, etc._ vosotros (as) habl =aseis= _You might speak, etc._ ellos, ellas habl =asen= _They might speak, etc._ ustedes habl =asen= _You might speak, etc._ IMPERFECTO, SEGUNDA FORMA yo habl =ara= _I might speak, be speaking._[374] etc._ ellos, ellas habl =aren= _They may speak, etc._ ustedes habl =aren= _You may speak, etc._ =Modo Imperativo= habla (tÃº) _speak_ (_thou_) hablad (vosotros) _speak_ (_ye_) =TIEMPOS COMPUESTOS= INFINITIVO GERUNDIO =haber hablado=, _to have spoken_ =habiendo hablado=, _having spoken_ =Modo Indicativo= PERFECTO yo he hablado _I have spoken, have been speaking._ tÃº has hablado _You have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella ha hablado _He, she has spoken, etc._ usted ha hablado _You have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hemos hablado _We have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ©is hablado _You have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas han hablado _They have spoken, etc._ ustedes han hablado _You have spoken, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO yo habÃ­a hablado _I had spoken, had been speaking._ tÃº habÃ­as hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella habÃ­a hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted habÃ­a hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) habÃ­amos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) habÃ­ais hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas habÃ­an hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes habÃ­an hablado _You had spoken._ PRETÃ‰RITO PERFECTO yo hube hablado _I had spoken._ tÃº hubiste hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella hubo hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted hubo hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) hubimos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) hubisteis hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas hubieron hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes hubieron hablado _You had spoken._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo habrÃ© hablado _I shall have spoken, been speaking._ tÃº habrÃ¡s hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ¡ hablado _He, she will have spoken, etc._ usted habrÃ¡ hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) habremos hablado _We shall have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ©is hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ¡n hablado _They will have spoken, etc._ ustedes habrÃ¡n hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ CONDICIONAL PERFECTO yo habrÃ­a hablado _I should or would have spoken, been speaking._ tÃº habrÃ­as hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ el, ella habrÃ­a hablado _He, she would have spoken, etc._ usted habrÃ­a hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) habrÃ­amos hablado _We should or would have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ­ais hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ­an hablado _They would have spoken, etc._ ustedes habrÃ­an hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ =Modo Subjuntivo= PERFECTO yo haya hablado _I may have spoken, been speaking._[376] tÃº hayas hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella haya hablado _He, she may have spoken, etc._ usted haya hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hayamos hablado _We may have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) hayÃ¡is hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas may have spoken, etc._ usted haya hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hayamos hablado _We may have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) hayÃ¡is hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas hayan hablado _They may have spoken, etc._ ustedes hayan hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO, PRIMERA FORMA yo hubiese hablado _I might have spoken, been speaking._[374] tÃº hubieses (familiar singular) _were eating, etc._ Ã©l, ella com =Ã­a= _He, she was eating, etc._ usted com =Ã­a= _You_ (polite singular) _were eating, etc._ nosotros (as) com =Ã­amos= _We were eating, etc._ she will eat, etc._ usted comer =Ã¡= _You will eat, etc._ nosotros (as) comer =emos= _We shall eat, etc._ vosotros (as) comer =Ã©is= _You will eat, etc._ ellos, ellas comer =Ã¡n= _They will eat, etc._ hayan comido

might eat, etc._ vosotros (as) com =ierais= _You might eat, etc._ ellos, ellas com =ieran= _They might eat, etc._ ustedes com =ieran= _You might eat, etc._ FUTURO yo com =iere= _I may eat, be COMPUESTOS= INFINITIVO GERUNDIO =haber comido=, _to have eaten_ =habiendo comido=, _having eaten_ =Modo Indicativo= PERFECTO yo he comido _I have eaten, have been eating._ tÃº has comido _You have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella ha comido _He, she has eaten, etc._ usted ha comido _You have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) hemos comido _We have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ©is comido _You have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas han comido _They have eaten, etc._ ustedes han comido _You have eaten, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO yo habÃ­a comido _I had eaten, had been eating._ tÃº habÃ­as comido _You had eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella habÃ­a comido _He, she had eaten, etc._ usted habÃ­a comido _You had eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) habÃ­amos comido _We had eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ­ais comido _You had eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas habÃ­an comido _They had eaten, etc._ ustedes habÃ­an comido _You had eaten, etc._ PRETÃ‰RITO PERFECTO yo hube comido _I had eaten._ tÃº hubiste comido _You had eaten._ Ã©l, ella hubo comido _He, she had eaten._ usted hubo comido _You had eaten._ nosotros (as) hubimos comido _We had eaten._ vosotros (as) hubisteis comido _You had eaten._ ellos, ellas hubieron comido _They had eaten._ ustedes hubieron comido _You had eaten._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo habrÃ© comido _I shall have eaten, been eating._ tÃº habrÃ¡s comido _You will have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ¡ comido _He, she will have eaten, etc._ usted habrÃ¡ comido _You will have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) habremos comido _We shall have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ©is comido _You will have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ¡n comido _They will have eaten, etc._ ustedes habrÃ¡n comido _You will have eaten, etc._ CONDICIONAL PERFECTO yo habrÃ­a comido _I should or would have eaten, been eating._ tÃº habrÃ­as comido _You would have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ­a comido _He, she would have eaten, etc._ usted habrÃ­a comido _You would have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) habrÃ­amos comido _We should or would have eaten, hubieres comido
tÃº hablar =Ã¡s= _You will speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella hablar =Ã¡= _He, she will speak, etc._ usted hablar =Ã¡= _You will speak, etc._ nosotros (as) hablar =emos= _We shall speak, etc._ vosotros (as) INFINITIVO GERUNDIO =haber hablado=, _to have spoken_ =habiendo hablado=, _having spoken_ =Modo Indicativo= PERFECTO yo he hablado _I have spoken, have been speaking._ tÃº has hablado _You have spoken._ ellos, ellas habÃ­an hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes habÃ­an hablado _You had spoken._ PRETÃ‰RITO PERFECTO yo hube hablado _I had spoken._ tÃº hubiste hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella _They had spoken._ ustedes hubieron hablado _You had spoken._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo habrÃ© hablado _I shall have spoken, been speaking._ tÃº habrÃ¡s hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ¡ INFINITIVO GERUNDIO =haber hablado=, _to have spoken_ =habiendo hablado=, _having spoken_ =Modo Indicativo= PERFECTO yo he hablado _I have spoken, have been speaking._ tÃº has hablado _You have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella ha hablado _He, she has spoken, etc._ usted ha hablado _You have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hemos hablado _We have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ©is hablado _You have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas han hablado _They have spoken, etc._ ustedes han hablado _You have spoken, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO yo habÃ­a hablado _I had spoken, had been speaking._ tÃº habÃ­as hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella habÃ­a hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted habÃ­a hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) habÃ­amos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) habÃ­ais hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas habÃ­an hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes habÃ­an hablado _You had spoken._ PRETÃ‰RITO PERFECTO yo hube hablado _I had spoken._ tÃº hubiste hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella hubo hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted hubo hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) hubimos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) hubisteis hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas hubieron hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes hubieron hablado _You had spoken._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo habrÃ© hablado _I shall have spoken, been speaking._ tÃº habrÃ¡s hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ¡ hablado _He, she will have spoken, etc._ usted habrÃ¡ hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) habremos hablado _We shall have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ©is hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ¡n hablado _They will have spoken, etc._ ustedes habrÃ¡n hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ CONDICIONAL PERFECTO yo habrÃ­a hablado _I should or would have spoken, been speaking._ tÃº habrÃ­as hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ el, ella habrÃ­a hablado _He, she would have spoken, etc._ usted habrÃ­a hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) habrÃ­amos hablado _We should or would have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ­ais hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ­an hablado _They would have spoken, etc._ ustedes habrÃ­an hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ =Modo Subjuntivo= PERFECTO yo haya hablado _I may have spoken, been speaking._[376] tÃº hayas hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella haya hablado _He, she may have spoken, etc._ usted haya hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hayamos hablado _We may have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) hayÃ¡is hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas hayan hablado _They may have spoken, etc._ ustedes hayan hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO, PRIMERA FORMA yo hubiese hablado _I might have spoken, been speaking._[374] tÃº hubieses hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella hubiese hablado _He, she might have spoken, etc._ usted hubiese hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hubiÃ©semos hablado _We might have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) hubieseis hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas hubiesen hablado _They might have spoken, etc._ ustedes hubiesen hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ INFINITIVO GERUNDIO PARTICIPIO PASIVO =comer=, _to eat_ =comiendo=, _eating_ =comido=, _eaten_ =TIEMPOS SIMPLES= =Modo Indicativo= PRESENTE yo com =o= _I eat, am eating, do eat._ tÃº com =es= _You_ (familiar singular) _eat, etc._ Ã©l, ella com =e= _He, she eats, etc._ usted com =e= _You_ (polite singular) _eat, etc._ nosotros (as) com =emos= _We eat, etc._ vosotros (as) com =Ã©is= _You_ (familiar plural) _eat, etc._ ellos, ellas com =en= _They eat, etc._ ustedes com =en= _You_ (polite plural) _eat, etc._ IMPERFECTO yo com =Ã­a= _I was eating, used to eat, ate._ tÃº com =Ã­as= _You_ (familiar singular) _were eating, etc._ Ã©l, ella com =Ã­a= _He, she was eating, etc._ usted com =Ã­a= _You_ (polite singular) _were eating, etc._ nosotros (as) com =Ã­amos= _We were eating, etc._ vosotros (as) com =Ã­ais= _You_ (familiar plural) _were eating, etc._ ellos, ellas com =Ã­an= _They were eating, etc._ ustedes com =Ã­an= _You_ (polite plural) _were eating, etc._ PRETÃ‰RITO yo com =Ã­= _I ate, did eat._ tÃº com =iste= _You ate, etc._ Ã©l, ella com =iÃ³= _He, she ate, etc._ usted com =iÃ³= _You ate, etc._ nosotros (as) com =imos= _We ate, etc._ vosotros (as) com =isteis= _You she will eat, etc._ usted comer =Ã¡= _You will eat, etc._ nosotros (as) comer =emos= _We shall eat, etc._ vosotros (as) comer =Ã©is= _You will eat, etc._ ellos, ellas comer =Ã¡n= _They will eat, etc._ =Ã­= _I ate, did eat._ tÃº com =iste= _You ate, etc._ Ã©l, ella com =iÃ³= _He, she ate, etc._ usted com =iÃ³= _You ate, etc._ nosotros (as) com =imos= _We ate, etc._ vosotros (as) com =isteis= _You ustedes comer =Ã¡n= _You will eat, etc._ CONDICIONAL yo comer =Ã­a= _I should or would eat, be eating._ tÃº comer =Ã­as= _You would eat, etc._ Ã©l, ella comer =Ã­a= _He, she would eat, etc._ usted COMPUESTOS= INFINITIVO GERUNDIO =haber comido=, _to have eaten_ =habiendo comido=, _having eaten_ =Modo Indicativo= PERFECTO yo he comido _I have eaten, have been eating._ tÃº has comido _You have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella ha comido _He, she has eaten, etc._ usted ha comido _You have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) hemos comido _We have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ©is comido _You have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas han comido _They have eaten, etc._ ustedes han comido _You have eaten, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO yo habÃ­a comido _I had eaten, had been eating._ tÃº habÃ­as comido _You had eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella habÃ­a comido _He, she had eaten, etc._ usted habÃ­a comido _You had eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) habÃ­amos comido _We had eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ­ais comido _You had eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas habÃ­an comido _They had eaten, etc._ ustedes habÃ­an comido _You had eaten, etc._ PRETÃ‰RITO PERFECTO yo hube comido _I had eaten._ tÃº hubiste comido _You had eaten._ Ã©l, ella hubo comido _He, she had eaten._ usted hubo comido _You had eaten._ nosotros (as) hubimos comido _We had eaten._ vosotros (as) hubisteis comido _You had eaten._ ellos, ellas hubieron comido _They had eaten._ ustedes hubieron comido _You had eaten._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo habrÃ© comido _I shall have eaten, been eating._ tÃº habrÃ¡s comido _You will have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ¡ comido _He, she will have eaten, etc._ usted habrÃ¡ comido _You will have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) habremos comido _We shall have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ©is comido _You will have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ¡n comido _They will have eaten, etc._ ustedes habrÃ¡n comido _You will have eaten, etc._ CONDICIONAL PERFECTO yo habrÃ­a comido _I should or would have eaten, been eating._ tÃº habrÃ­as comido hubiereis comido

hablar =Ã©is= _You will speak, etc._ ellos, ellas hablar =Ã¡n= _They will speak, etc._ ustedes hablar =Ã¡n= _You will speak._ CONDICIONAL yo hablar =Ã­a= _I should or would speak, be speaking._ tÃº hablar =Ã­as= _You would speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella hablar =Ã­a= _He, she would speak, etc._ usted hablar =Ã­a= _You would speak, etc._ nosotros (as) hablar =Ã­amos= _We should or would speak, etc._ vosotros (as) hablar =Ã­ais= _You would speak, etc._ ellos, ellas hablar =Ã­an= _They would speak, etc._ ustedes hablar =Ã­an= _You would speak, etc._ =Modo Subjuntivo= PRESENTE yo habl =e= _I may speak, be speaking._[374] tÃº habl =es= _You may speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella habl =e= _He, she may speak, etc._ usted habl =e= _You may speak, etc._ nosotros (as) habl =emos= _We may speak, etc._ vosotros (as) habl =Ã©is= _You may speak, etc._ ellos, ellas habl =en= _They may speak, etc._ ustedes habl =en= _You may speak, etc._ IMPERFECTO, PRIMERA FORMA yo habl =ase= _I might speak, be speaking._[374] tÃº habl =ases= _You might speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella habl =ase= _He, she might speak, etc._ usted habl =ase= _You might speak, etc._ nosotros (as) habl =Ã¡semos= _We might speak, etc._ vosotros (as) habl =aseis= _You might speak, etc._ ellos, ellas habl =asen= _They might speak, etc._ ustedes habl =asen= _You might speak, etc._ IMPERFECTO, SEGUNDA FORMA yo habl =ara= _I might speak, be speaking._[374] tÃº habl =aras= _You might speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella habl =ara= _He, she might speak, etc._ usted habl =ara= _You might speak, etc._ nosotros (as) habl =Ã¡ramos= _We might speak, etc._ vosotros (as) habl =arais= _You might speak, etc._ ellos, ellas habl =aran= _They might speak, etc._ ustedes habl =aran= _You might speak, etc._ FUTURO yo habl =are= _I may speak, be speaking._[375] tÃº habl =ares= _You may speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella habl =are= _He, she may speak, etc._ usted habl =are= _You may speak, etc._ nosotros (as) habl =Ã¡remos= _We may speak, etc._ vosotros (as) habl =areis= _You may speak, etc._ ellos, ellas habl =aren= _They may speak, etc._ ustedes habl =aren= _You may speak, etc._ =Modo Imperativo= habla (tÃº) _speak_ (_thou_) hablad (vosotros) _speak_ (_ye_) =TIEMPOS COMPUESTOS= INFINITIVO GERUNDIO =haber hablado=, _to have spoken_ =habiendo hablado=, _having spoken_ =Modo Indicativo= PERFECTO yo he hablado _I have spoken, have been speaking._ tÃº has hablado _You have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella ha hablado _He, she has spoken, etc._ usted ha hablado _You have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hemos hablado _We have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ©is hablado _You have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas han hablado _They have spoken, etc._ ustedes han hablado _You have spoken, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO yo habÃ­a hablado _I had spoken, had been speaking._ tÃº habÃ­as hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella habÃ­a hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted habÃ­a hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) habÃ­amos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) habÃ­ais hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas habÃ­an hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes habÃ­an hablado _You had spoken._ PRETÃ‰RITO PERFECTO yo hube hablado _I had spoken._ tÃº hubiste hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella hubo hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted hubo hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) hubimos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) hubisteis hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas hubieron hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes hubieron hablado _You had spoken._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo habrÃ© hablado _I shall have spoken, been speaking._ tÃº habrÃ¡s hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ¡ hablado _He, she will have spoken, etc._ usted habrÃ¡ hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) habremos hablado _We shall have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ©is hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ¡n hablado _They will have spoken, etc._ ustedes habrÃ¡n hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ CONDICIONAL PERFECTO yo habrÃ­a hablado _I should or would have spoken, been speaking._ tÃº habrÃ­as hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ el, ella habrÃ­a hablado _He, she would have spoken, etc._ usted habrÃ­a hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) habrÃ­amos hablado _We should or would have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ­ais hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ­an hablado _They would have spoken, etc._ ustedes habrÃ­an hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ =Modo Subjuntivo= PERFECTO yo haya hablado _I may have spoken, been speaking._[376] tÃº hayas hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella haya hablado _He, she may have spoken, etc._ usted haya hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hayamos hablado _We may have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) hayÃ¡is hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas hayan hablado _They may have spoken, etc._ ustedes hayan hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO, PRIMERA FORMA yo hubiese hablado _I might have spoken, been speaking._[374] tÃº hubieses hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella hubiese hablado _He, she might have spoken, etc._ usted hubiese hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hubiÃ©semos hablado _We might have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) hubieseis hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas hubiesen hablado _They might have spoken, etc._ ustedes hubiesen hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) hubieseis hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas hubiesen hablado _They might have spoken, etc._ ustedes hubiesen hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ hubieran hablado _They might have spoken, etc._ ustedes hubieran hablado _You might have spoken, etc._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo hubiere hablado _I may have spoken, been speaking._[377] tÃº hubieres hablado (familiar singular) _eat, etc._ Ã©l, ella com =e= _He, she eats, etc._ usted com =e= _You_ (polite singular) _eat, etc._ nosotros (as) com =emos= _We eat, etc._ vosotros (as) com =Ã©is= _You_ (familiar plural) _eat, etc._ ellos, ellas com =en= _They eat, etc._ ustedes com =en= _You_ (polite plural) _eat, etc._ IMPERFECTO yo com =Ã­a= _I was eating, used to eat, ate._ tÃº com =Ã­as= _You_ (familiar singular) _were eating, etc._ Ã©l, ella com =Ã­a= _He, she was eating, etc._ usted com =Ã­a= _You_ (polite singular) _were eating, etc._ nosotros (as) com =Ã­amos= _We were eating, etc._ vosotros (as) com =Ã­ais= _You_ (familiar plural) _were eating, etc._ ellos, ellas com =Ã­an= _They were eating, etc._ ustedes com =Ã­an= _You_ (polite plural) _were eating, etc._ PRETÃ‰RITO yo com =Ã­= _I ate, did eat._ tÃº com =iste= _You ate, etc._ Ã©l, ella com =iÃ³= _He, she ate, etc._ usted com =iÃ³= _You ate, etc._ nosotros (as) com =imos= _We ate, etc._ vosotros (as) com =isteis= _You she will eat, etc._ usted comer =Ã¡= _You will eat, etc._ nosotros (as) comer =emos= _We shall eat, etc._ vosotros (as) comer =Ã©is= _You will eat, etc._ ellos, ellas comer =Ã¡n= _They will eat, etc._ COMPUESTOS= INFINITIVO GERUNDIO =haber comido=, _to have eaten_ =habiendo comido=, _having eaten_ =Modo Indicativo= PERFECTO yo he comido _I have eaten, have been eating._ tÃº has comido _You have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella ha comido _He, she has eaten, etc._ usted ha comido _You have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) hemos comido _We have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ©is comido _You have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas han comido _They have eaten, etc._ ustedes han comido _You have eaten, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO yo habÃ­a comido _I had eaten, had been eating._ tÃº habÃ­as comido _You had eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella habÃ­a comido _He, she had eaten, etc._ usted habÃ­a comido _You had eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) habÃ­amos comido _We had eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ­ais comido _You had eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas habÃ­an comido _They had eaten, etc._ ustedes habÃ­an comido _You had eaten, etc._ PRETÃ‰RITO PERFECTO yo hube comido _I had eaten._ tÃº hubiste comido _You had eaten._ Ã©l, ella hubo comido _He, she had eaten._ usted hubo comido _You had eaten._ nosotros (as) hubimos comido _We had eaten._ vosotros (as) hubisteis comido _You had eaten._ ellos, ellas hubieron comido _They had eaten._ ustedes hubieron comido _You had eaten._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo habrÃ© comido _I shall have eaten, been eating._ tÃº habrÃ¡s comido _You will have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ¡ comido _He, she will have eaten, etc._ usted habrÃ¡ comido _You will have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) habremos comido _We shall have eaten, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ©is comido _You will have eaten, etc._ ellos, ellas habrÃ¡n comido _They will have eaten, etc._ ustedes habrÃ¡n comido _You will have eaten, etc._ CONDICIONAL PERFECTO yo habrÃ­a comido _I should or would have eaten, been eating._ tÃº habrÃ­as comido _You would have eaten, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ­a comido _He, she would have eaten, etc._ usted habrÃ­a comido _You would have eaten, etc._ nosotros (as) habrÃ­amos comido _We should or would have eaten, hubiéramos comido

(polite plural) _were living, etc._ PRETÃ‰RITO yo viv =Ã­= _I lived, did live._ tÃº viv =iste= _You lived, etc._ Ã©l, ella viv =iÃ³= _He, she lived, etc._ usted viv =iÃ³= _You lived, etc._ nosotros (as) viv =imos= _We lived, etc._ vosotros (as) viv =isteis= _You lived, etc._ ellos, ellas viv =ieron= _They lived, etc._ ustedes viv =ieron= _You lived, etc._ FUTURO yo vivir =Ã©= _I shall live, be living._ tÃº vivir =Ã¡s= _You will live, etc._ Ã©l, ella vivir =Ã¡= _He, she will live, etc._ usted vivir =Ã¡= _You will live, etc._ nosotros (as) vivir =emos= _We shall live, etc._ vosotros (as) vivir =Ã©is= _You will live, etc._ ellos, ellas vivir =Ã¡n= _They will live, etc._ ustedes vivir =Ã¡n= _You will live, etc._ CONDICIONAL yo vivir =Ã­a= _I should or would live, be living._[374] tÃº vivir =Ã­as= _You would live, etc._ Ã©l, ella vivir =Ã­a= _He, she would live, etc._ usted vivir =Ã­a= _You would live, etc._ nosotros (as) vivir =Ã­amos= _We should or would live, etc._ vosotros (as) vivir =Ã­ais= _You would live, etc._ ellos, ellas vivir =Ã­an= _They would live, etc._ ustedes vivir =Ã­an= _You would live, etc._ =Modo Subjuntivo= PRESENTE yo viv =a= _I may live, be living._[382] tÃº viv =as= _You may live, etc._ Ã©l, ella viv =a= _He, she may live, etc._ usted viv =a= _You may live, etc._ nosotros (as) viv =amos= _We may live, etc._ vosotros (as) viv =Ã¡is= _You may live, etc._ ellos, ellas viv =an= _They may live, etc._ ustedes viv =an= _You may live, etc._ IMPERFECTO, PRIMERA FORMA yo viv =iese= _I might live, be living_.[374] tÃº viv =ieses= _You might live, etc_.

hubierais comido
tÃº hablar =Ã¡s= _You will speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella hablar =Ã¡= _He, she will speak, etc._ usted hablar =Ã¡= _You will speak, etc._ nosotros (as) hablar =emos= _We shall speak, etc._ vosotros (as) hablar =Ã­as= _You would speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella hablar =Ã­a= _He, she would speak, etc._ usted hablar =Ã­a= _You would speak, etc._ nosotros (as) hablar =Ã­amos= _We should or would speak, etc._ vosotros (as) hablar =Ã­ais= _You would speak, etc._ ellos, ellas hablar =Ã­an= _They would speak, etc._ ustedes hablar =Ã­an= _You would speak, etc._ =Modo Subjuntivo= PRESENTE yo habl =e= _I may tÃº habl =ases= _You might speak, etc._ Ã©l, ella habl =ase= _He, she might speak, etc._ usted habl =ase= _You might speak, etc._ nosotros (as) habl =Ã¡semos= _We might speak, etc._ vosotros (as) habl etc._ ellos, ellas habl =aren= _They may speak, etc._ ustedes habl =aren= _You may speak, etc._ =Modo Imperativo= habla (tÃº) _speak_ (_thou_) hablad (vosotros) _speak_ (_ye_) =TIEMPOS COMPUESTOS= INFINITIVO GERUNDIO =haber hablado=, _to have spoken_ =habiendo hablado=, _having spoken_ =Modo Indicativo= PERFECTO yo he hablado _I have spoken, have been speaking._ tÃº has hablado _You have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella ha hablado _He, she has spoken, etc._ usted ha hablado _You have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) hemos hablado _We have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habÃ©is hablado _You have spoken, etc._ ellos, ellas han hablado _They have spoken, etc._ ustedes han hablado _You have spoken, etc._ PLUSCUAMPERFECTO yo habÃ­a hablado _I had spoken, had been speaking._ tÃº habÃ­as hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella habÃ­a hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted habÃ­a hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) habÃ­amos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) habÃ­ais hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas habÃ­an hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes habÃ­an hablado _You had spoken._ PRETÃ‰RITO PERFECTO yo hube hablado _I had spoken._ tÃº hubiste hablado _You had spoken._ Ã©l, ella hubo hablado _He, she had spoken._ usted hubo hablado _You had spoken._ nosotros (as) hubimos hablado _We had spoken._ vosotros (as) hubisteis hablado _You had spoken._ ellos, ellas hubieron hablado _They had spoken._ ustedes hubieron hablado _You had spoken._ FUTURO PERFECTO yo habrÃ© hablado _I shall have spoken, been speaking._ tÃº habrÃ¡s hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella habrÃ¡ hablado _He, she will have spoken, etc._ usted habrÃ¡ hablado _You will have spoken, etc._ nosotros (as) habremos hablado _We shall have spoken, etc._ vosotros (as) habrÃ©is hablado _You will have hablado _You would have spoken, etc._ =Modo Subjuntivo= PERFECTO yo haya hablado _I may have spoken, been speaking._[376] tÃº hayas hablado _You may have spoken, etc._ Ã©l, ella haya hablado _He, she The expression _no es cosa_ is used familiarly in the sense of _es mucha_.] [Footnote 8: volvÃ­a.

In Wordsworth's beautiful poem _The White Doe of Rylstone_ we find the doe divested of all the elements of witchcraft, and in its solicitude for the gentle and bereft Lady Emily it is likened symbolically To the grief of her soul that doth come and go In the beautiful form of this innocent Doe: Which, though seemingly doomed in its breast to sustain A softened remembrance of sorrow and pain, Is spotless, and holy, and gentle, and bright; And glides o'er the earth like an angel of light.
The verb form which follows the preposition in Spanish is always the infinitive and not the present participle as in English.] [Note 127: =despedirse de=, _to take leave of_.] [Note 128: =llamarse=, _to be called_ (speaking of one's name).] [Note 129: =emprender un viaje=, _to set out on a journey_.] [Note 130: =asociarse a=, _to join_.] [Note 131: =dar con=, _to come upon, tu meet_.] [Note 132: =montar un caballo=, _to ride a horse_.] [Note 133: =ponerse a=, _to begin_] [Note 134: =acabar de dar=, _to have just given_.
The word _FIN_ in bones concludes the series of grotesque and uncanny sketches, which but emphasize a fact ever present in the poet's mind--that while we are in life we _are_ in death.] Finding his devotion to Julia unrequited, Becquer, in a rebellious mood, and having come under the influence of the charms and blandishments of a woman of Soria, a certain Casta EstÃ©ban y Navarro, contracted, in or about the year 1861, an unfortunate marriage, which embittered the rest of his life and added cares and expenses which he could ill support.

It was in the autumn of 1854 that Becquer arrived in Madrid, "with empty pockets, but with a head full of treasures that were not, alas, to enrich him." Here he encountered an indifference that he had not dreamed of; and here he remained in the shadow of oblivion, eking out a miserable existence of physical as well as mental suffering, in utter loneliness of spirit, until he was joined in 1856 by one who came to be his lifelong friend and first biographer--RamÃ³n Rodriguez Correa, who had come to the capital with the same aims as Becquer, and whose robust health and jovial temperament appealed singularly to the sad and ailing dreamer.
It is always followed by an infinitive.] [Note 85: =tener a la vista,= _to keep in sight._] [Note 86: =poner a calentar,= _to put on to heat._] [Note 87: =ponerse a,= _to begin._] [Note 88: =dormirse,= _to fall asleep._] [Note 89: =pensar en,= _to think of._] [Note 90: =ver salir,= _to see come out._ Verbs of perception in Spanish are usually followed by the infinitive if by any form of the verb.] [Note 91: =dar tumbos,= _to stagger about._] [Note 92: =andar a tientas,= _to grope one's way._] [Note 93: =sin sentido=, _unconscious_.] =ABUELO Y NIETO= Las almas de buen temple no se abaten en la desgracia, ni se degradan en la pobreza.

coma
It may occur between the article and its substantive, the possessive adjective and its substantive, a preposition and its object, the negatives _no_ and _ni_ and a following vowel; and after the conjunctions _y, que, si_, and other words having a weak accent such as _desde, coma, todo, otro, cuando_, etc.
RELATED WORDS: =MecanÃ³grafo=, _typewriter_ (_the person_); =taquÃ­grafo=, _stenographer_; =mÃ¡quina con caracteres en espaÃ±ol=, _typewriter with Spanish keyboard_; =mÃ¡quina de escribir de escritura visible=, _typewriter with visible writing_; =teclado=, _keyboard_; =tecla para mayÃºsculas=, _(shift) key for capitals_; =tecla para minÃºsculas=, _key for small letters_; =cifras=, _numerals_; =signos=, _signs_; =palanca= (_lever_) =de retroceso=, _back spacer_; =palanca de espacios=, _spacer_; =espacios sencillos=, _single spacing_; =espacios dobles=; =espacios triples=; =papel de mÃ¡quina=; =papel carbÃ³n= or =de calcar=; =papel de estarcir=, _stencil paper_; =cinta=, _ribbon_; =cinta de un color=; =cinta de dos colores=; =color negro=, =rojo=, =pÃºrpura=; =coma=; =dos puntos=, _colon_; =punto y coma=; =punto=; =puntos suspensivos=; =acento=; =acento agudo=; =acento grave=; =acento circunflejo=; =parÃ©ntesis=; =abrir el parÃ©ntesis=; =cerrar el parÃ©ntesis=; =signo de interrogaciÃ³n=; =signo de admiraciÃ³n=; =guiÃ³n=, _hyphen_; =subrayado=, _underlined_; =apÃ³strofo=; =raya oblicua=, _slant bar_; =signo de etcÃ©tera=; =signo de tanto por ciento=; =signo de pesos=.
=coma=, _f._, comma.

[60.22] =Â¡Feliz quien se las coma!= 'happy he who eats them.' The pronoun =se=, an ethical dative or dative of interest, is best not translated.

semicolon, colon._ =Signos de admiraciÃ³n(Â¡!), signos de interrogaciÃ³n (Â¿?).= _Exclamation point, question mark._ =Principio de admiraciÃ³n (Â¡),= _first exclamation point_, =de interrogaciÃ³n= --Â¡Mal rayo me parta treinta veces y media, y permita Dios que al primer noroeste que me coja en la mar me coman las merluzas!...
